channel.title: [317 Delta] Dragon Claws Animation
channel.description:
In my Server which is a Delta base 317, has Dragon claws that work, but like 70%. When I use the special attack it drains bar but doesn't do any of the emotes and only hits once. Can anybody help me by posting like where to add the animation and 4x hit? I know it is a public boolean or something. So here's what I need answered:
1. Where to change the attack animation. 2. Where to make it hit x4. 3. What the code of the special attack animation is. 4 What the code of the hit x4 is.
Please help me! I will be very Grateful! :o Also, my D claws item ID is 6587 if that helps in the code.

item.title: [317 Delta] Dragon Claws Animation
item.dc:creator: @excel4 excel4
item.description:
@excel4 wrote:

Thanks Nardo! Thats the main thing I was looking for. But one problem… Its not on my GFX list and I don’t think on my emotes either! :eek: Thanks for helping anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Dragon Claws Animation
item.dc:creator: @nardoscape nardoscape
item.description:
@nardoscape wrote:

I can anwser #3, usually the emote code of the animation is 2068 but te be honest you can make that anything you want.
